Class PostgreGenerator

java.lang.Object
edu.rit.g2.generator.PostgreGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
SqlGenerator
public class PostgreGenerator extends Object implements SqlGenerator
Generates SQL DDL output for the PostgreSQL DBMS.

This class currently acts as a placeholder implementation within the SqlGenerator strategy hierarchy. While PostgreSQL SQL generation is not yet implemented, this class ensures API consistency and allows for the functionality to be extended in the future without disrupting other components.

When fully implemented, this generator will produce PostgreSQL-compatible SQL statements based on the structure defined in a SchemaModel, such as:

  • CREATE TABLE definitions
  • Column type mappings for PostgreSQL
  • Primary and foreign key constraints
  • Serial/Identity support for auto-incrementing columns
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Frane

  • Method Details

    • generate

      public String generate(SchemaModel schema)
      Generates PostgreSQL DDL for the provided SchemaModel.

      PostgreSQL SQL generation is not yet implemented. For now, this method returns a placeholder comment indicating that functionality will be added in a future release.

      Specified by:
      generate in interface SqlGenerator
      Parameters:
      schema - the schema model to convert to PostgreSQL SQL; currently unused
      Returns:
      a placeholder SQL comment indicating unimplemented functionality
